It all comes down to grain. Exposure 2 gives you the most realistic grain on the market, now with even more control over sharpness, color variation, and intensity throughout the tonal range. And since Exposure 2ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s grain size automatically adjusts to your image size, you get consistent results across all of your cameras.

So easy to use. Exposure 2 simplifies your workflow by collecting color, dynamic range, softness, and grain control into one easy-to-use plug-in.
